name: TutorialPlatformer2D
description:
CONTROLS: Use the left and right arrow keys to move around. Jump with the up arrow key.

I made this playable demo to showcase the instructions outlined in my tutorial serie: How to Make a 2D Platformer in Unity. I wanted to make a simple and comprehensive introduction to creating games with Unity with code, explanation and assets available to everyone. 

FEATURES:  

- Player Controller for movement and animation

- Patrolling Monster

- End Game Target

- Level Creation with Tilemaps

A lot of other introductory stuff presented in a simple and approachable manner!

You can find the links to the different tutorial parts here: https://www.noveltech.dev/work/tutorial-platformer-2d-unity/

All the code and assets used can be found on my github: https://github.com/Wally869/TutorialPlatformer2D

If you are just starting in Game Development in Unity, I hope you find this useful!
